name: Run for Supplies
description:
Run for Supplies The game is in the development stage right now. If you have any feedback or suggestions please consider to write a comment down below.
 It is recommended to play a downloadable version for a better experience.

Run for Supplies is a simple economic strategy game where you play as an interplanetary expedition captain. You must expand borders of the empire and decide how newly acquired planets will bring benefits to it.

The game was originally created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Expand

Direct your ship to unknown worlds and grab them and their resources to your hands.

Build

Build structures on newly acquired planets to gain income and increase population.

Upgrade

Upgrade your ship and general infrastructure to open new possibilities and strategic advantages before yourself.

Plan

Plan your moves few steps ahead. Try to not overexpand and save precious resources.

State of the game Current version (0.2.4) has:
  • 4 difficulty levels
  • 8 planet types with different resources and available srtuctures
  • Over 25 different structures to build
  • 5 ship upgrades and 2 general upgrades
  • Very basic tutorial
  • English and Russian languages
Planned features:
  • More progression and the end goal
  • Random events
  • Collectable in space artefacts with additional bonuses
  • Visual and sound improvements
  • Leaderboards
Known issues:
  • Sometimes can be generated many planets of the same type in one area
  • Structures balance is not really good
Credits
  • Game by Nikita Kartashov
  • Music by StaLeX
  • Special thanks to GMTK, the GMTK Game Jam and all of the people who played the game and left their feedback during the Jam.
